oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Grand Ole Opry - Prince Albert - 1956-06-16 - Part 2
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part 2 of Prince Albert tobacco sponsored Grand Ole Opry segment from June 16, 1956. Featuring Grant Turner (announcer), Little Jimmy Dickens (host/performer), guest performer Patsy Cline, and regular performers Rod Brasfield, Dale Potter, Tommy Jackson, Lew Childre, Del Wood, Minnie Pearl, and Grandpa Jones. Held at Ryman Auditorium, Nashville, TN.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Del Wood; Minnie Pearl; Rod Brasfield; Patsy Cline; Grandpa Jones; Little Jimmy Dickens
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Ivory Corn (Del Wood) [continued from part 1] -- Little Jimmy Dickens introduces Minnie Pearl -- Comedy routine (Minnie Pearl, Little Jimmy Dickens, Rod Brasfield) -- Little Jimmy Dickens introduces Patsy Cline -- I've Loved And Lost Again (Patsy Cline) -- Little Jimmy Dickens introduces Grandpa Jones -- Old Blue (Grandpa Jones) -- Little Jimmy Dickens talks -- It Scares Me Half To Death (Little Jimmy Dickens) -- Closing theme -- Closing statement (Little Jimmy Dickens) -- Cavalier Cigarettes commercial -- Station announcements
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); National Broadcasting Company; Grand ole opry (Radio program); Ryman Auditorium (Nashville, Tenn.); Turner, Grant; Brasfield, Rod; Minnie Pearl; Wood, Del; Jones, Grandpa, 1913-1998; Jackson, Tommy; Childre, Lew, 1901-1961; Cline, Patsy, 1932-1963; Potter, Dale; Dickens, Little Jimmy, 1920-
